title: University CRM
description: Project simulates a university CRM in which we can manage students, instructors and courses. The rest API was built with Spring Boot. The frontend was built with React, and the data is persisted in a Amazon RDS

title: Sudoku solver
description: This Sudoku solver uses backtracking to solve the board. It will detect errors on the board dynamically while the user enters the data.
